_description: Unified council feature registry linking maturity, fragility, governance policy context, and feature-level QA/security placeholders.

source_refs.notes: Complete implementation. Last finding: rubber-stamping detection (Cycle QA, fixed). Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle. Feature Review 01 completed (SDD 167).
Governed: read events with attendees/body, meeting prep/debrief, enriched normalization. Target met. Feature Review 02 completed (SDD 168).
Implemented migration runner + startup path with blocked/failed/migrated events and dry-run tests. Feature Review 03 deep re-review passed (SDD 169).
Implemented untrusted-content isolation prompts, hard-ban/output-contract enforcement, and contamination replay assertions. Feature Review 04 deep re-review passed (SDD 170).
Governed: deal pipeline, stage management, stale owner tracking, retrospective, auto-brief. Target met. Feature Review 05 deep re-review passed (SDD 171).
Incremental scan and dedup quality guardrails are now governed through policy and replay evidence. Feature Review 06 deep re-review passed (SDD 172).

Governed: document workflows now include SharePoint connector quality policy + friction evidence logging. Next: content extraction, document intelligence, and data room orchestration. Feature Review 07 deep re-review passed (SDD 173).
6-state lifecycle plus self-healing dead-letter handling. Retry-pending path remains a follow-up implementation item. Feature Review 08 deep re-review passed (SDD 174).

Governed: ingestion, triage, draft generation, and Graph action loop. Missing: semantic thread retrieval and contract alignment on draft-generation response fields. Feature Review 09 deep re-review passed (SDD 175).

Governed evaluation controls include explicit policy thresholds, canary budgets, replay gates, and drift guardrails; persistence/scheduling depth is next. Feature Review 10 deep re-review passed (SDD 176).

Core architecture with append-only dual-write and upcaster coverage; event taxonomy currently spans 279 event types. Integrity-chain and projection depth are next. Feature Review 11 deep re-review passed (SDD 177).

Single sidecar ingress enforces auth + execution boundary + release-gate checks; next hardening step is route-policy parity enforcement and hard release-gate mode. Feature Review 12 deep re-review passed (SDD 178).

Safety stack includes hard bans, output/entity/contradiction checks, trust validation telemetry, and operator-required controls; policy-threshold externalization remains. Feature Review 13 deep re-review passed (SDD 179).
Entity-level PHI control stack with provider gating and redaction-scope gaps documented. Feature Review 14 deep re-review passed (SDD 180).
Ingestion idempotency, duplicate suppression, and quality-threshold enforcement path re-reviewed with concrete runtime evidence. Feature Review 15 deep re-review passed (SDD 181).
Policy-scoped retrieval, citation controls, and adversarial replay coverage re-reviewed with mode-promotion gaps documented. Feature Review 16 deep re-review passed (SDD 182).
Mail/Calendar/Planner/To Do/SharePoint connector surface re-reviewed with retry/webhook hardening actions defined. Feature Review 17 deep re-review passed (SDD 183).
Single-operator reality and deferred multi-user architecture prerequisites re-validated. Feature Review 18 deep re-review passed (SDD 184).
Compatibility/deprecation controls and migration-state safeguards re-reviewed with sunset-replay expansion actions defined. Feature Review 19 deep re-review passed (SDD 185).
Style, memory, calibration, archetype, and voice-extraction loops re-reviewed with context-adaptive gaps documented. Feature Review 20 deep re-review passed (SDD 186).
Prompt version registry loader/fallback behavior re-reviewed with promotion-gate and integrity controls prioritized. Feature Review 21 deep re-review passed (SDD 187).
Cross-system drift detection, proposal dedup, and operator approval gates re-reviewed with deterministic-ID action plan defined. Feature Review 22 deep re-review passed (SDD 188).
Cron parsing, six-gate dispatch loop, and maintenance job controls re-reviewed with jitter/concurrency hardening actions defined. Feature Review 23 deep re-review passed (SDD 189).
Migration manifest/state and upcaster chain controls re-reviewed with coverage-gate expansion actions defined. Feature Review 24 deep re-review passed (SDD 190).
Circuit-breaker, drift, autonomy, engagement, and zombie-draft recovery controls re-reviewed with policy externalization actions defined. Feature Review 25 deep re-review passed (SDD 191).
SharePoint route safety, friction telemetry, and operator-gated writes re-reviewed with document-intelligence next steps defined. Feature Review 26 deep re-review passed (SDD 192).
Planner/To Do/GTD/commitment lifecycle and sync approval flow re-reviewed with prioritization and identity-mapping actions defined. Feature Review 27 deep re-review passed (SDD 193).
